scripts.dev: rimraf dev-dist && set DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa&& set SW_DEV=true&& vite --force
scripts.dev-claims: rimraf dev-dist && set DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa&& set SW_DEV=true&& set CLAIMS=true&& set SW=true&& vite --force
scripts.dev-destroy: rimraf dev-dist && set DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa&& set SW_DESTROY=true&& set SW_DEV=true&& vite --force
scripts.dev-claims-destroy: rimraf dev-dist && set DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa&& set SW_DESTROY=true&& set SW_DEV=true&& set CLAIMS=true&& set SW=true&& vite --force
scripts.start: yarn run run-build && yarn run serve
scripts.start-reloadsw: yarn run run-build-reloadsw && yarn run serve
scripts.start-claims: yarn run run-build-claims && yarn run serve
scripts.start-claims-reloadsw: yarn run run-build-reloadsw-claims && yarn run serve
scripts.start-sw: yarn run run-build-sw && yarn run serve
scripts.start-sw-reloadsw: yarn run run-build-sw-reloadsw && yarn run serve
scripts.start-sw-claims: yarn run run-build-sw-claims && yarn run serve
scripts.start-sw-claims-reloadsw: yarn run run-build-sw-claims-reloadsw && yarn run serve
scripts.build: set DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa&& set BASE_URL=/&& set SOURCE_MAP=true&& vite build
scripts.run-build: set DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa&& set BASE_URL=/&& set SOURCE_MAP=true&& vite build
scripts.run-build-reloadsw: set DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa&& set BASE_URL=/&& set SOURCE_MAP=true&& set RELOAD_SW=true&& vite build
scripts.run-build-claims: set DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa&& set BASE_URL=/&& set SOURCE_MAP=true&& set CLAIMS=true&& vite build
scripts.run-build-reloadsw-claims: set DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa&& set BASE_URL=/&& set SOURCE_MAP=true&& set CLAIMS=true&& set RELOAD_SW=true&& vite build
scripts.run-build-sw: rimraf dist && set NODE_ENV=production&& set DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa&& set BASE_URL=/&& set SOURCE_MAP=true&& set SW=true&& vite build
scripts.run-build-sw-reloadsw: set DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa&& set BASE_URL=/&& set SOURCE_MAP=true&& set RELOAD_SW=true&& set SW=true&& vite build
scripts.run-build-sw-claims: set DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa&& set BASE_URL=/&& set SOURCE_MAP=true&& set CLAIMS=true&& set SW=true&& vite build
scripts.run-build-sw-claims-reloadsw: set DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa&& set BASE_URL=/&& set SOURCE_MAP=true&& set CLAIMS=true&& set RELOAD_SW=true&& set SW=true&& vite build
scripts.start-destroy: yarn run run-build-destroy && yarn run serve
scripts.start-reloadsw-destroy: yarn run run-build-reloadsw-destroy && yarn run serve
scripts.start-claims-destroy: yarn run run-build-claims-destroy && yarn run serve
scripts.start-claims-reloadsw-destroy: yarn run run-build-reloadsw-claims-destroy && yarn run serve
scripts.start-sw-destroy: yarn run run-build-sw-destroy && yarn run serve
scripts.start-sw-reloadsw-destroy: yarn run run-build-sw-reloadsw-destroy && yarn run serve
scripts.start-sw-claims-destroy: yarn run run-build-sw-claims-destroy && yarn run serve
scripts.start-sw-claims-reloadsw-destroy: yarn run run-build-sw-reloadsw-claims-destroy && yarn run serve
scripts.run-build-destroy: set DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa&& set BASE_URL=/&& set SOURCE_MAP=true&& set SW_DESTROY=true&& vite build
scripts.run-build-reloadsw-destroy: set DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa&& set BASE_URL=/&& set SOURCE_MAP=true&& set SW_DESTROY=true&& set RELOAD_SW=true&& vite build
scripts.run-build-claims-destroy: set DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa&& set BASE_URL=/&& set SOURCE_MAP=true&& set SW_DESTROY=true&& set CLAIMS=true&& vite build
scripts.run-build-reloadsw-claims-destroy: set DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa&& set BASE_URL=/&& set SOURCE_MAP=true&& set SW_DESTROY=true&& set CLAIMS=true&& set RELOAD_SW=true&& vite build
scripts.run-build-sw-destroy: rimraf dist && set DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa&& set BASE_URL=/&& set SOURCE_MAP=true&& set SW_DESTROY=true&& set SW=true&& vite build
scripts.run-build-sw-reloadsw-destroy: set DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa&& set BASE_URL=/&& set SOURCE_MAP=true&& set SW_DESTROY=true&& set RELOAD_SW=true&& set SW=true&& vite build
scripts.run-build-sw-claims-destroy: set DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa&& set BASE_URL=/&& set SOURCE_MAP=true&& set SW_DESTROY=true&& set CLAIMS=true&& set SW=true&& vite build
scripts.run-build-sw-reloadsw-claims-destroy: set DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa&& set BASE_URL=/&& set SOURCE_MAP=true&& set SW_DESTROY=true&& set CLAIMS=true&& set RELOAD_SW=true&& set SW=true&& vite build
scripts.test-build-claims: yarn run run-build-claims && vitest run && playwright test
scripts.test-build-sw-claims: yarn run run-build-sw-claims && set SW=true&& vitest run && set SW=true&& playwright test
scripts.test: yarn run test-build-claims && yarn run test-build-sw-claims
scripts.start-prod: yarn run run-build && yarn run start-preview --host
